nodes.text: Shepherd Squadron was a New Republic fighter wing that was based on Rattatak. They participated in the assault on the Fondor Shipyards and the Battle of Jakku.

Shepherd Squadron fought during the Battle of Fondor Shipyards where their mission was to destroy the Interdictor-class Star Destroyer Spectral that was providing cover so Star Destroyers could escape. They fought deployed TIE fighters and failed there mission as Yancee Drai was killed as her X-wing exploded and Bak Rychuk disappeared into hyperspace with the ship.
Shepherd Squadron, consisting of a mix of A-wings, X-wings, and Y-wings, later arrived along with the rest of the New Republic fleet during the Battle of Jakku.
